| HistoryText             = When the Wise Men in the East saw a brilliant star in the sky, they knew that the [[Jesus of Nazareth (Earth-616)|Messiah]] had come. They took gold, frankincense and myrrh with them as gifts.<!-- {{r|Bible Tales for Young Folk #1}} -->

They came the king [[Herod (Earth-616)|Herod]] to know where was the king of the Jews, as they wished to worship him. Herod's priests sent them to [[Bethlehem]], and Herod asked them to bring the news, so he could also come and worship him. Following the star, they eventually found [[Mary of Nazareth (Earth-616)|Mary]], [[Joseph of Nazareth (Earth-616)|Joseph]] and Jesus, and gave him the gifts.<!-- {{r|Bible Tales for Young Folk #1}} -->

Later in the night, an [[Angels of Heaven|angel]] came to them in a dream and warned them not to return to Herod but to leave in another way.{{r|Bible Tales for Young Folk #1}}
